articles.title: This Tool Can Tell You If Your Home Network Has Been Compromised - Lifehacker
articles.description: IP Check tells you if your address is involved in malicious scanning.

articles.title: Google releases factory, OTA images for second Pixel December 2025 update - 9to5Google
articles.description: On Wednesday, Google started rolling out a second December 2025 update for Pixel phones, with factory and OTA images now available.

articles.title: NotebookLM now uses Gemini 3, adds new ‘Data Tables’ output - 9to5Google
articles.description: NotebookLM is getting in a few more features before the holidays, including an upgrade to Gemini 3 and Data Tables.

articles.title: Steam Drops Early Free Slice of Stunning 2026 RPG, Play Now - GAMINGbible
articles.description: The Legend of Heroes: Trails beyond the Horizon is an upcoming RPG that has just dropped a free demo for players to try on Steam.

articles.title: Gemini isn’t replacing Google Assistant on Android just yet - The Verge
articles.description: Google is pushing back its timeline for replacing Google Assistant with Gemini on Android, as it now says it will continue upgrading devices into 2026, rather than by the end of 2025.

articles.title: Switch 2 pub backs off Game Key Cards after leaking lower-cost cartridge options - Ars Technica
articles.description: Inin suggests new low-cost options allowed it to “recalculate production” for full cartridge.
